meanings.sent1: She decided to recutting the paper to make it smaller.
meanings.sent2: The tailor had to recutting the fabric to fix the mistake.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to recutting the vegetables after they were chopped unevenly.
meanings.sent4: The sculptor carefully recutting the marble to create intricate details.
meanings.sent5: The gardener recutting the hedge to maintain its shape and neatness.

meanings.definition: The act of cutting again or anew.
meanings.sent1: The recutting of the cake was necessary to share it with everyone.
meanings.sent2: The recutting of the diamond revealed its true brilliance.
meanings.sent3: The recutting of the film added new scenes for the director's cut.
meanings.sent4: The recutting of the key was done to fit the new lock.
meanings.sent5: The recutting of the wood allowed for more precise measurements in carpentry.
